about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Get to know us better
about.description: We are a leading technology company, working to provide innovative solutions that help businesses grow and evolve. Our professional team includes experts in various technical fields.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide innovative technical solutions that help our clients achieve their goals

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the first choice for companies seeking technical excellence

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Innovation, quality, and commitment to providing the best customer experience

goals.title: System Goals
items: Support quality assurance units in managing and organizing all quality activities electronically
Promote the culture of quality and accreditation among faculty members, students, and staff
Organize and distribute quality tasks and monitor their accurate implementation
Create and manage quality files and assess them easily
Conduct electronic surveys and analyze their results statistically
Receive complaints and suggestions and prepare reports on them
Prepare comprehensive periodic reports supporting accreditation requirements
Improve communication between all parties in the educational system
Support decision makers through accurate reports and analysis

targetAudience.title: Target Audience
targetAudience.subtitle: The system serves all parties involved in the quality system within Egyptian universities

whyThisSystem.title: Why This System?
reasons: Complies with quality and accreditation standards adopted in Egyptian universities
Provides a unified and secure digital work environment
Reduces effort and time spent on paperwork
Enables monitoring and evaluation anytime, anywhere
Scalable and applicable to multiple faculties or universities

team.title: About the Team
team.description: This system was designed and developed by a specialized team of students from the Faculty of Computers and Information, as part of an applied academic project aimed at linking theoretical study with practical application, and providing a realistic technical solution that serves the educational community. The team relied on the latest concepts of software engineering, systems analysis, and database design, with commitment to professional standards in building information systems, so that the system comes out in a professional form that is capable of development and actual application within educational institutions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions

questions.question: What services do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer a wide range of technical services including web development, mobile applications, and cloud solutions.

questions.question: How long does project implementation take?
questions.answer: The duration varies depending on the size and requirements of the project, typically ranging from 4-12 weeks.

questions.question: Do you provide technical support after delivery?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide full technical support for 6 months after delivery, with the option to extend.

questions.question: What is the cost of services?
questions.answer: The cost depends on project requirements. We offer a free consultation to assess your needs and provide a custom quote.
